### Berom
Ma sey tsak o na Dagwi Darwey Wo Reto Mwa,<br>
yɛ de a yong lagwi na bajey mwa.<br>
<br>
Ma sey tsak o na Yɛsu Kristi,<br>
hwêy Dagwi Darwey mot, yɛ nju mɛ,<br>
de ba yong ɛ yi na Gabik Jɛrɛ.<br>
Hwong Marya a tɔ ɛ.<br>
A di reyɔm e jeng negwɔm Pɔntiyus Pilatus.<br>
Ba kak ɛ e ra cɔgɔt, yɛ a ku, ba lɛrɛ revin mɛ e ji sak.<br>
A yel e kwɔ̂n bevuvwel.<br>
Tuk hê tat a sene yi e reku,<br>
a tut vɔk e lagwi,<br>
a sangal e vwɔ yegê Dagwi Darwey Wo Reto Mwa.<br>
Yi e hwomo yɛ a rɔda to vɛ hɛ, na a bin ra a beken na bavin shɔt.<br>
<br>
Ma sey tsak o na Gabik Jɛrɛ,<br>
ekilisiya wo jɛrɛ wo jey mwa,<br>
nesâ vê jɛrɛ, halsâ banɛn,<br>
sensâ babek, na neken gbak-gbak.<br>
Ano.<br>



### English
I believe in God the Father Almighty,<br>
maker of heaven and earth.<br>
<br>
And in Jesus Christ His only Son our Lord,<br>
who was conceived by the Holy Spirit,<br>
born of the virgin Mary.<br>
He suffered under Pontius Pilate.<br>
Was crucified died and buried,<br>
He descended into Hades.<br>
The third day He rose again from the dead,<br>
He ascended into heaven,<br>
seated at the right hand of God the Father Almighty.<br>
From there He shall come to judge the living and the dead.<br>
<br>
I believe in the Holy Spirit,<br>
the holy universal church,<br>
the Communion of saints, the forgiveness of sins,<br>
the resurrection of the body and the life everlasting.<br>
Amen.<br>
